zh: 不要强迫孩子吃东西。

en: The murder case may bear a relation on his sudden death.

en: The park was designed for small children.
zh: 这个公园是为小孩子设计的。

en: The park lies in the center of the city.
zh: 这个公园位于市中心。

en: The park is governed by the city.
zh: 这个公园由市政府管理。

en: The park was built for the benefit of the public.
zh: 建造这个公园是为了公众的利益。

en: The park is common property.
zh: 这个公园是公共财产。

en: The park was crowded with people with children.
zh: 公园里挤满了带着孩子的人。

en: There were many signs in the park that said "Keep off the grass."
zh: 公园里有很多标语写着“请勿践踏草坪”。

en: The park is busy every season.
zh: 这个公园每个季节都很热闹。

en: Didn't you visit the park?
zh: 你没去公园吗？

en: That park is full of amusements.
zh: 那个公园里有很多娱乐设施。

en: Is there a zoo in the park?
zh: 公园里有动物园吗？

en: There are a lot of tall trees in the park.
zh: 公园里有很多高大的树木。

en: There are no less than two hundred trees in the park.
zh: 公园里至少有两百棵树。

en: The scene brought her words home to him.
zh: 眼前的景象让他明白了她话中的意思。

en: The sight fetched tears from their eyes.
zh: 这景象让他们热泪盈眶。

en: His courage began to shake when he saw the sight.
zh: 看到这景象，他的勇气开始动摇了。

en: I could not help laughing at the sight.
zh: 我忍不住笑了出来。

en: I couldn't help laughing at the sight.
zh: 我忍不住笑了出来。

en: The sight made a chill run down my spine.
zh: 这景象让我不寒而栗。

en: The sight struck me with wonder.
zh: 这景象让我感到惊奇。

en: That sight was seen, and I felt fear.
zh: 我看到了那景象，感到害怕。

en: My hair stood on end with horror when I saw the scene.
zh: 看到那情景，我吓得毛骨悚然。

en: I was much frightened at the sight.
zh: 我被那景象吓坏了。

en: My blood curdled at that sight.
zh: 看到那景象，我吓得血液都凝固了。

en: The sight made my flesh creep.
zh: 这景象让我毛骨悚然。

en: I was frightened by the sight.
zh: 我被这景象吓到了。

en: The sight made my blood freeze.
zh: 这景象让我感到血液都冻住了。

en: I was frightened at the sight.
zh: 我被这景象吓到了。

en: I saw the sight and laughed in spite of myself.
zh: 我看到了那景象，情不自禁地笑了出来。

en: Never shall I forget the sight.
zh: 我永远不会忘记这景象。

en: The sight was too miserable to look at.
zh: 这景象太惨不忍睹了。

en: The beauty of the scene was beyond description.
zh: 这景象的美丽简直无法形容。

en: The scenery was beautiful beyond description.
zh: 这景色美得无法形容。

en: That scene was branded on her memory.
zh: 那个场景深深地印在她的记忆里。

en: The scene brought out the mother in her.
zh: 那个场景唤起了她的母性。

en: The scene was burned into my memory.
zh: 那个场景深深地烙在我的记忆里。

en: The scene was clearly printed in my memory.
zh: 那个场景清晰地印在我的记忆里。

en: The sight was splendid beyond description.
zh: 那景象美妙得难以形容。

en: I could not bear to see the scene.
zh: 我不忍心看到那个场景。

en: The sight arrested my attention.
zh: 那景象吸引了我的注意力。

en: The scene made my stomach turn.
zh: 那个场景让我感到恶心。

en: It shines on the beautiful sea.
zh: 它照耀着美丽的海面。

en: It is strange how vividly I remember the scene.
zh: 奇怪的是，我竟然如此清晰地记得那个场景。

en: The sight has been indelibly etched in my mind.
zh: 那景象已经深深地刻在我的脑海里。

en: The candidate handed out a great amount of money in the election.
zh: 那位候选人在选举中大量撒钱。

en: The candidate is the kind of person that we can look up to.
zh: 这位候选人是我们能够敬佩的那种人。

en: The candidate is running for mayor.
zh: 这位候选人正在竞选市长。

en: The candidate waved his hand to whomever he saw.
zh: 那位候选人向他看到的每个人挥手。

en: The traffic accident is fresh in his memory.
zh: 那场交通事故在他的记忆中还很鲜明。

en: The traffic accident happened before my very eyes.
zh: 那场交通事故就发生在我眼前。

en: The traffic accident took place on the highway.
zh: 那场交通事故发生在高速公路上。

en: How did the traffic accident come about?
zh: 那场交通事故是怎么发生的？

en: The driver does not have responsibility for the traffic accident.
zh: 司机对这起交通事故没有责任。

en: I was upset by the news of the traffic accident.
zh: 我因交通事故的消息而感到难过。

en: He missed the train because of the traffic accident.
zh: 他因为交通事故而错过了火车。

en: Two people were killed in the traffic accident.
zh: 两人在交通事故中丧生。

en: The key of the symphony is G minor.
zh: 这部交响乐的调是G小调。

en: It was my brother that made the mistake.
zh: 犯错的是我的哥哥。

en: Look the word up for yourself in the dictionary.
zh: 你自己查字典找这个词。

en: The word is expressive of my feelings.
zh: 这个词表达了我的感受。

en: The word has acquired broad meaning.
zh: 这个词已经获得了广泛的含义。

en: What does this word mean?
zh: 这个词是什么意思？

en: The words were spelled wrong.
zh: 这些词拼写错了。

en: How do you spell the word?
zh: 这个词怎么拼写？

en: His misspelling of that word eliminated him from the contest.
zh: 他把那个词拼错了，导致他被淘汰出比赛。

en: Will you please explain to me the exact meaning of the word?
zh: 请你给我解释一下这个词的确切含义好吗？

en: What is the precise meaning of the word?
zh: 这个词的准确含义是什么？

en: Find out the meaning of the word for yourself.
zh: 自己查一下这个词的意思。

en: The accent of the word is on the second syllable.
zh: 这个词的重音在第二个音节上。

en: Do you know the French equivalent of the word?
zh: 你知道这个词的法语对应词吗？

en: The word has several meanings.
zh: 这个词有几个意思。

en: I have no idea what has become of her since.
zh: 我不知道她后来怎么样了。

en: After that, he went home.
zh: 在那之后，他回家了。

en: I have never heard of him since.
zh: 从那以后，我就再也没听说过他了。

en: Thereafter we heard no more from him.
zh: 此后，我们就再也没有收到他的消息。

en: I never spoke to him after that.
zh: 在那之后，我再也没有和他说话。

en: There followed a prolonged silence.
zh: 随之而来的是长时间的沉默。

en: Do you have anything to do after that?
zh: 在那之后你有什么事要做吗？

en: The patron appreciates genuine antiques.
zh: 顾客欣赏真正的古董。

en: And soon after I procured Xenophon's Memorable Things of Socrates, in which there are many instances of the same method.
zh: 不久之后，我得到了色诺芬的《苏格拉底回忆录》，其中有很多同样的例子。

en: After that he began to enjoy life again and gradually recovered.
zh: 在那之后，他开始再次享受生活，并逐渐康复。

en: After that, many live in special homes for the aged where their children and grandchildren can come to visit them.
zh: 在那之后，许多人住在专门的老年人之家，他们的孩子和孙子可以来看望他们。

en: You know the rest of the story.
zh: 你知道故事的其余部分了。
